# Some stuff about me

My Ph.D. was awarded in 2003 by the University of Adelaide, where I was appointed Lecturer in 2006, promoted to Senior Lecturer in 2009 and Associate Professor in 2013. I held multiple Australian Research Council (ARC) Fellowships from 2007-2015 and from 2016 have been Associate Professor at UNSW Sydney.
